net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.attribute

Interface AttributeWriteHeightInRows

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AttributeReadHeightInRows
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    UiWidgetAdapterCodeAreaField, UiWidgetAdapterRichTextField, UiWidgetAdapterTextAreaField, UiWidgetAdapterTextAreaFieldBase, UiWidgetCodeAreaField, UiWidgetListBoxField<VALUE>, UiWidgetRichTextField, UiWidgetTextAreaField
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractUiWidgetCodeAreaField, AbstractUiWidgetRichTextField, AbstractUiWidgetTextAreaField, AbstractUiWidgetTextAreaFieldBase, UiWidgetAdapterGwtRichTextField, UiWidgetAdapterGwtTextAreaBase, UiWidgetAdapterGwtTextAreaField, UiWidgetAdapterTestStringField, UiWidgetCodeAreaFieldTestImpl, UiWidgetRichTextFieldGwt, UiWidgetRichTextFieldTestImpl, UiWidgetTextAreaFieldGwt, UiWidgetTextAreaFieldTestImpl

    public interface AttributeWriteHeightInRows
extends AttributeReadHeightInRows
    This interface gives read and write access to the height in rows of an object.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setHeightInRows(int rows)
      This method sets the height in rows of this object.

      • setHeightInRows

        void setHeightInRows(int rows)
        This method sets the height in rows of this object.
        Parameters:
        rows - is the new value for height in text lines to set.
